Directions: In a large saucepan, cook beef and sausage over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Sprinkle with flour. Add the soup, tomatoes, onion and garlic powder; mix well. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Reduce heat. Stir in cheese until melted. Serve warm with tortilla chips. Refrigerate any leftovers.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chilies, undrained
